programme.desc: The No. 9 Volunteers (10-2) draw the No. 8 Buckeyes (10-2) in the College Football Playoff's first round. Ohio State went 3-4 during the four-team era of the CFP, winning a national title in 2014-15. Tennessee beat OSU in the 1995-96 Citrus Bowl.

programme.title: Playoff Quarterfinal at the Vrbo Fiesta Bowl
programme.desc: The No. 3 Broncos (12-1) and No. 6 Nittany Lions (12-2) meet in the Fiesta Bowl for a CFP quarterfinal. Penn State got two pick-sixes in a 38-10 romp over No. 11 SMU on Dec. 21. Boise State star Ashton Jeanty finished second in Heisman Trophy voting.

programme.title: Playoff Quarterfinal at the Chick-Fil-A Peach Bowl
programme.desc: The Peach Bowl hosts a College Football Playoff quarterfinal between the No. 4 Sun Devils (11-2) and No. 5 Longhorns (12-2). Texas, a 38-24 first-round winner over No. 12 Clemson, defeated Arizona State 52-34 in 2007, their lone previous meeting.

programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival, unless Speed Meister beats them to it; when Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The Guppies must move fast when a herd of cows wanders onto the train tracks.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: Police Officers Molly and Gil are tracking some mysterious lights that have been popping up around town; with the help of several nocturnal animal friends, they discover the lights aren't aliens but anglerfish.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The Bubble Guppies learn about construction while building a doghouse for Bubble Puppy.

programme.title: Team Umizoomi
programme.desc: The team must guide Ellee the elephant through Umi City so she can make her debut at the circus.

programme.title: Team Umizoomi
programme.desc: Milli, Geo and Bot compete against the Robot Athletes in the Umi Games.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: In ancient Greece, paramedics Zooli and Gil get a call for help from Nonny, so they fly toward him in their chariot ambulance; on the way, they're pursued by a Cyclops.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.sub-title: A Slow Day in Zippy City!
programme.desc: Everything is fast in Zippy City, but when Tiny the Slug and the Opposites Crew slow everything down to the opposite of fast with sticky slime, detectives Zooli and Goby have to stop them before it's too late.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.sub-title: Hiccups; Daddy Loses His Glasses; Polly Parrot; Snow; Dressing Up
programme.desc: George gets the hiccups; Daddy loses his glasses; Peppa and George visit their grandparents; snow; Peppa and George love dressing up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.sub-title: Danny's Pirate Party; The Train Ride; Teddy Playgroup; A Trip to the Moon; Numbers
programme.desc: Danny Dog's birthday arrives; Peppa and her friends go on a train ride; Peppa brings home a teddy; Peppa's family goes to a Moon Exhibition; Peppa and her friends learn how to count.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.sub-title: The Eye Test; Grandad Dog's Garage; Foggy Day; Jumble Sale; Swimming
programme.desc: Peppa's friend wears glasses; Peppa's car runs out of petrol; Peppa and George play at the playground; Peppa's play group holds a jumble sale; Peppa's family goes to the pool.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise; Pups Save a Tower of Pizza
programme.desc: Rocky and the pups fix an old junk car for Ace Sorensen's birthday; Adventure Bay works hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Mail; Pups Save a Frog Mayor
programme.desc: When the postman's truck gets stuck in the mud, the mail is stuck in a tree; Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol takes part in a big mer-race, but Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save a Goldrush; Pups Save the PAW Patroller
programme.desc: The Pups must chase down Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew when they steal gold found in Adventure Bay; Mayor Humdinger orders the Kit-tastrophe Crew to steal the Paw Patroller.

programme.desc: The heroic rescue pups, led by a tech-savvy boy named Ryder work together to protect the community; geared with special skills, gadgets and vehicles that help them on their rescue missions, the PAW Patrol is always up for the challenge.

programme.desc: Mientras Joel lucha por sobrevivir, Ellie recuerda la noche que lo cambió todo.

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: Tras cruzarse con un vengativo grupo de supervivientes, el espíritu de lucha de Ellie atrae la atención de su líder. Joel, aún luchando por su vida, se enfrenta a un grupo sediento de sangre.

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: Joel y Ellie alcanzan la meta de su largo viaje: la base de las Luciérnagas. Sin embargo, pronto descubren que tienen que realizar un último sacrificio.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Después de conocer a la mujer de sus sueños, Scott Pilgrim debe enfrentarse a un ejército de exparejas que quieren deshacerse de él.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: El fugitivo Dominic Toretto y el agente Brian O'Conner reavivan su enemistad, aunque las circunstancias los obliga a unir fuerzas contra un enemigo común: deben encontrar al asesino de Vince.

programme.title: Warcraft: El primer encuentro de dos mundos
programme.desc: El pacífico reino de Azeroth está a punto de entrar en guerra contra unos terribles invasores que han dejado su destruido reino para colonizar otro. Dos héroes están a punto de chocar y cambiar el destino de su familia, su pueblo y su hogar.

programme.title: Tangerine
programme.desc: Después de enterarse de que su novio la engañó mientras estaba en la cárcel, una prostituta y su mejor amiga idean un plan para darle una lección.

programme.title: The Florida Project
programme.desc: Halley vive con Moonee, su hija de 6 años, en el motel que regenta Bobby, un hombre de aspecto rudo pero de carácter compasivo. Pese a todos los problemas por los que pasan, para la pequeña Moonee cada día es una nueva oportunidad de ser feliz.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: El Escarabajo, una antigua reliquia extraterrestre, elige al estudiante Jaime Reyes como el huésped simbiótico en cuyo cuerpo resguardarse. A partir de ese momento, Jaime desarrolla una armadura que le otorga poderes increíbles e impredecibles.

programme.title: Blue Beetle

programme.title: Batman

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: La ciudad de Gotham está amenazada por un psicópata que ha inventado un estrafalario aparato que permite absorber las ondas cerebrales de los seres humanos.

programme.title: Batman & Robin

programme.title: La dama de oro

programme.desc: A passionate neuroscientist must save her patients from her own invention before losing her mind.

programme.desc: When an interdimensional rupture unravels reality, an unlikely hero must channel her newfound powers to fight bizarre and bewildering dangers from the multiverse.

programme.desc: A silent-film star (Gene Kelly) loves a chorus girl (Debbie Reynolds) who dubs his squeaky-voiced co-star in a 1927 Hollywood talkie.
